companies.name: Quibim
companies.reason: This Spanish startup is pioneering the use of AI in medical imaging to perform virtual biopsies, targeting significant advancements in healthcare technology.

companies.name: Genengine
companies.reason: A technology startup focused on healthcare that enables the detection of rare diseases using advanced technologies, making it a remarkable candidate in the health tech space.

companies.name: Cohere
companies.reason: Part of the new wave of startups focused on AI and natural language processing, Cohere is gaining attention for its innovative approach to language models and applications in various industries.
